introSection.mainSubtitle: Start reducing costs and transforming customer and citizen experiences with Gataca’s decentralized digital identity platform
introSection.mainParagraph: We provide your organization with the tools to manage secure digital identification systems.

credentials.credential_name: This is a very long credential name so see how it performs

bulletsSection.title: DIGITAL IDENTITY MANAGEMENT
bulletsSection.description: We use identity credentials daily to access local citizen services, prove our qualifications, or file an insurance claim. But as we have rapidly transformed our lives online, identification and authentication systems have not kept up. Gataca's identity management platform is designed for the digital age.

elements.title: COMPLIANT
elements.description:
• Official, W3C verifiable credential issuance

  • KYC and GDPR compliant

  • Self-sovereign data control

  • Data exchange minimization

bulletsEnhancedSection.title:
DECENTRALIZED
IDENTITY PLATFORM
bulletsEnhancedSection.description: Gataca has built a user-centric digital identity platform with government-grade security and a simple single-sign-on to superpower your credentials. Our identity management platform enables fast, secure, and compliant data exchange between credential issuers, users, and service providers.

elements.title: CREDENTIAL ISSUERS
elements.description: Issuers can create and validate secure W3C verifiable contactless digital credentials.

elements.title: END-USERS
elements.description: Users are powered with an ID wallet in their phones and digitally verified ID credentials to enjoy passwordless privacy-preserving access to digital services in under 30 seconds

elements.title: SERVICE PROVIDERS
elements.description: Service providers can offer an authentication alternative that users love while cutting KYC and GDPR compliance cost and reducing data breach risks

endBullet.title: PRIVACY BY DESIGN
endBullet.description: Gataca embraces privacy-by-design and never stores information about an individual’s identity.

ctaSection.title: Ready to start?
ctaSection.description: Learn about how decentralized digital identity can transform your customers' experiences
